data.message: If Rihanna could stop singing crappy mediocre songs on her own solo career and stop being a corporate puppet that'd be great. Eminem surely has heavy shoulders from carrying her and making her more famous than she deserves to be.

replies.message: They're both at the top of their game in their own genres.  Neither needed the other...but the collaborations didn't hurt.
u don now wht u talking about rihanna is already famous stupid
he met her allready famous ,if u don like her who care ???she is famous already
Agreed she's a mediocre talent at best y doesn't he tour with other rappers instead of her
That's right Eminem made her more popular

You people don't understand Rihanna used to be a good artist on her own before "Good Girl Gone Bad", then she started singing crappy songs because she sold herself out to the corporate companies for more money and now she's with Marshal. As for Eminem, he was also in the corporate sector but then he left and he started rapping about his life which made him really famous, he actually deserves the fame he's earned
